content: We will need the candidate's email,phone(optional),sex,birthdate,first name and last name in order to identify the candidate to proceed to the  next registration step.
The above user details will be removed once the candidature is rejected
When the candidate is selected, his/her data will be kept for tracking candidature history and profile creation.
